snippet: Advocates are urging Congress to approve a plan to create a national park encompassing the remaining sites involved in the Manhattan Project.
abstract: Advocates are urging Congress to approve plan for Manhattan Project National Historical Park that would preserve remnants of World War II-era atomic bomb project spread across three states; critics have faulted plan as celebrating weapons of mass destruction.
lead_paragraph: Advocates are urging Congress to approve a plan to create a national park encompassing the remaining sites involved in the Manhattan Project.

headline.seo: A National Park Proposed to Preserve Atomic Bomb Sites
headline.main: Bid to Preserve Manhattan Project Sites in a Park Stirs Debate
headline.print_headline: Bid to Preserve Manhattan Project Sites in a Park Stirs Debate
